Naming/FileName.description:
Description

Use snake_case for source file names.
Naming/FileName.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

ExpectMatchingDefinition: False (type: bool)
CheckDefinitionPathHierarchy: True (type: bool)
CheckDefinitionPathHierarchyRoots: ['lib', 'spec', 'test', 'src'] (type: list)
Regex: None (type: NoneType)
IgnoreExecutableScripts: True (type: bool)
AllowedAcronyms: ['CLI', 'DSL', 'ACL', 'API', 'ASCII', 'CPU', 'CSS', 'DNS', 'EOF', 'GUID', 'HTML', 'HTTP', 'HTTPS', 'ID', 'IP', 'JSON', 'LHS', 'QPS', 'RAM', 'RHS', 'RPC', 'SLA', 'SMTP', 'SQL', 'SSH', 'TCP', 'TLS', 'TTL', 'UDP', 'UI', 'UID', 'UUID', 'URI', 'URL', 'UTF8', 'VM', 'XML', 'XMPP', 'XSRF', 'XSS'] (type: list)
